text: it began in December 2013 in melyandd Oh
a remote forest village in Guinea two
year old Emile wamu no infected his
pregnant mother SIA within days they
both died as did his sister philomene
followed by their grandmother khumba a
nurse became infected and the village
Midwife who was treated at ghek Adu
hospital one of her close relatives
traveled to the village of danda Pamba
taking the Ebola virus six deaths
followed here
someone from gecko to hospital fell ill
and was treated in the centre where a
doctor became infected after the
doctor's funeral in kissa Dougal his two
brothers died along with three more
people the virus continued to spread and
on the 23rd of March the World Health
Organization declared Ana bola outbreak
in Guinea
a week later Liberia confirmed its first
death soon it spread to the densely
populated capital Monrovia Sierra Leone
investigated and on the 25th of May
confirmed its first case as the Ebola
virus reached the capital Freetown a
year after the first case more than 5000
people have lost their lives in what has
become the world's worst Ebola outbreak
